Text:
Greetings from Bucharest, Rotschild! ^_^

Could you, PLEASE, tell me how may I find something *similar* and FREE like Megavideo had been, at one point? :-(  I need to store my filthy porn somewhere with a view! :-))) Meaning, I need a Web-integrated player capable of HD and many - many minutes if not hours of rolling. And, considering that I cannot repair my DVD writer just yet to free-up hard drive space...

Please, HELP, I am desperate!

P.S. I like Brandi... in a twisted, fad way. :P

With friendship,
Silviu
